inst_axis_1553_decoder
axis_1553_decoder #(
.
CLOCK_SPEED(CLOCK_SPEED),
.
SAMPLE_RATE(SAMPLE_RATE),
.
BIT_SLICE_OFFSET(BIT_SLICE_OFFSET),
.
INVERT_DATA(INVERT_DATA),
.
SAMPLE_SELECT(SAMPLE_SELECT)
) inst_axis_1553_decoder ( .aclk(clk), .arstn(rstn), .m_axis_tdata(m_axis_tdata[15:0]), .m_axis_tvalid(m_axis_tvalid), .m_axis_tuser(m_axis_tdata[23:16]), .m_axis_tready(~rx_full), .diff(i_diff) )

Decode incoming differential 1553 data stream to AXIS data format.
